Question
========
What is the typical way to update R, and what might you need to redo afterward?

Answerlist
----------
* Install the new R version separately and be prepared to reinstall packages
* Use an automatic in-app updater built into the R GUI
* Wait for your operating system to push R updates through its app store
* Delete the old R folder manually and hope packages stay intact

Solution
========
Updating R usually means installing the new version alongside the old one; after upgrading you often need to reinstall packages for the new version.
